data.text:
With the elimination of mask requirements in schools and people coming back from break, I hope the school buildings don't become a petri dish.

More details (pulled from CT DPH and CDC data) available here: https://t.co/4BmDpIjBGd

Because the District takes a narrow view of how they count cases we are almost certainly getting an undercount of cases in schools.

https://t.co/YcnL64i2SI
@CTRamblings BA.2 was increasing at Brown Univ wastewater. It's slowly creeping up if you follow Nathan Grubaugh

This is the same number of cases we had all week last week, when people were not in school.

https://t.co/Izlqec8G0e
